outline:
1. to repeat, do again, change, alter
    1. (Qal) to change
    2. (Niphal) to be repeated
    3. (Piel) to change, alter
    4. (Hithpael) to disguise oneself
kjv_def: do (speak, strike) again, alter, double, (be given to) change, disguise, (be) diverse, pervert, prefer, repeat, return, do the second time.
strongs_def: to fold, i.e. duplicate (literally or figuratively); by implication, to transmute (transitive or intransitive)
